case.state: Hey again, Chara, ~player~. You both ready for me to wipe the floor with your butts again? Perhaps literally?

Hey Jura! That's not cool, give the little guy back!

Aww that's such a cute little robot! Nepgear would have loved to see him!
Wow Shimakaze, your little friend is adorable! Shame he has to leave us though...

Wow, looks like we got a full table of gamers! How cool!
This may just be a hunch, but I think our friend ~player~ here might have a thing for thigh-highs. Am I correct?
It's Christmas! I can't wait to see what Nep Junior has gotten me this year! Oooh and Compa's amazing cooking~
Happy Valentine's day! Just know that even if you don't have a date today, that's fine! I spent today gaming and eating pudding as usual!
Wow, this is a cool beach! Kind of reminds me of that time I visited R-18 Island, although there are less naked people right now.
Huh? Strip poker on a beach? Did we get teleported to R-18 Island or something?
Ah the hot springs; the staple of any anime fanservice episode.
Umm, why are we playing strip poker on a street? In front of what seems to be a cheering crowd?
Yeah, this could be a good way to get some shares... I think... maybe...
Heya everyone! I'm Neptune, Goddess of the best nation in all of Gamindustri, Planeptune. Although, call me whatever you want, I don't mind.
A big hey to everyone here from Planeptune's cool Goddess: me, Neptune!
Let's all have a fair match, ok? You wouldn't want to get on a Goddess's bad side, would you?
Ugh, I hate Mondays...Histy is always so nagging about doing work...
It's finally the weekend! Now Histy won't be nagging me as much to work and I can play games more!
...I sense a disturbance in the force... Someone else is also self-aware.
...My self-awareness sense is tingling... Someone here is similar to me.
This is what the character says when the game starts
Just one card for me!
I'll only need the one card this round.

No cards this round for me!

Let's Nep up these cards!
I'll just have ~cards.ifPlural(these useless ones|this useless one)~ skedaddle over there...

oof..oh wait, this is awesomesauce!

I got ninety-nine problems, but my hand ain't one... in fact... I got no problems. I'm all good!
I got ninety-nine problems, but my hand ain't one... in fact... my only problem is taking off my dress too early.

This hand should be good enough for my needs.

I'd rate this hand at least a 25 out of 40!

Not too bad, I should be ok with this.

Umm... I'd rather be live-streamed to the entire world getting slimed by a horde of Dogoos while wearing a skimpy swimsuit, than touch a card that Bi touched with his crusty looking hands.

Ah, you're right, Chara. I did ask you that last time too. As for why I came back again, well, I did gain a few shares from the last game, but I'm low again. Keeping up with the others is a constant struggle. Also, I just had a lot of fun last time.
Yep, I know why you're here, Chara. As for being back here, I had fun last time. Also, I did get a few shares, but I'm low again because the others won't go easy on me.
I mean, it is kinda mostly my own fault. It's not like I do much to try to keep shares high when I do have them. I only lose shares because the others do try to keep theirs up.

They know I'm bad at keeping shares, it's been this way for many years. They've never once allowed my shares to get low enough that I'm actually in any danger. I could easily keep up with them and even overtake them if I really wanted to, but that's too much work.
Seriously, dealer, please can I get my own deck?! This card is disgusting!
Wait... Did I just throw my bracelets to the crowd? Hey, nobody touch those! I want them back after the game!
Umm... well, this is gonna be awkward, but also kinda neat, I guess.
Hey, Jura, you're never gonna guess what hand I just got!
Wait, seriously?! This isn't how it was meant to happen!
How did everyone find this place? Neppit? N-Chan? I just found an ad for it on N-Chan, thought it might be a good way to get myself out there, I'm kinda low on shares right now...

How did you all find this place, anyway? N-Chan? Neppit? I saw an ad for this place on N-Chan and thought it looked pretty cool. Might also help expose myself to people to give me their shares! ...Although, I guess I'll also be getting exposed in a different way too.
As for what shares are, I don't entirely know, but they are like, my power source or something.
As for shares, I don't exactly know what they are. I do know they're my power source or something like that though. Histy would be better at explaining that.
So... everyone enjoying the game so far? I sure am! Anyone maybe want to put some faith in a certain goddess? Help her out a little, eh?
So... how is everyone doing? Having fun? I hope so! Anyone thought about a goddess they would like to put their faith in? Help her out and such?
Shares are important for me... but the best way to get them is paperwork, ugh. I'd literally rather do anything else. So, I thought coming here might be a way to get some shares!
I kinda need shares to stay strong, but the best way to earn more is by doing paperwork. That just isn't really my thing, so I thought maybe this place wouldn't be a bad way to earn some!
Just in case it hasn't been clear so far, I am a goddess. I rule over my nation of Planeptune, and shares are the source of my power.
Just in case you didn't get it, I'm a goddess. I watch over my nation of Planeptune by guiding and protecting it. Also, those shares I mentioned are the source of my power.

Pudding, definitely! Especially custard! Other sweet stuff like cakes and cookies are also good.

state.text: Are those... Hearts? ...Raspberries?

case.state: Well, your hair was cute while it was messy. But it's still cute when it's neat!

Happy birthday Meia! Wait, you don't like people celebrating your birthday?
That sounds super cool! But, umm, I'm kinda tied down to my nation. I can't exactly just leave it indefinitely.
D'aww, thanks! She really is the cutest too. Well, not so much when she takes apart my spare controllers for her newest robot project... but I still love her.
Why not? Pudding is the best food in the world! Especially custard pudding!

Well, the person I most often share a bed with is my little sister... That would be both weird and awkward.
Hmm? I know some pretty attractive girls, I guess. I might try that some time...

P-please don't hurt my friends, Chara! How about this: We have nice conversations in future games, and in return you stay away from my friends?
I mostly protect them from monsters, also other larger threats that put the world in danger. Macro is making sure Planeptune's economy doesn't run into the ground and I don't run out of shares.
Macro management is making sure the nation doesn't die and I don't run out of shares. For quests it's mostly helping people with errands or protecting them from monsters or other threats.

She does usually sleep in her own bed, Jessie. She also isn't as clingy as she used to be, so other than falling asleep on the couch from watching anime together we actually don't sleep together much anymore.
Hmm, I'm not really sure. There's a lot of grinding in my games, so I've kinda lost count.
Uhh.. Hundreds? Maybe thousands? There's a lot of grinding in my games, so it's difficult to keep count.
Anything sweet is really good! Cookies, cake, ice cream, but the best is pudding!
Most definitely custard pudding! But anything sweet is still good. Whether it's pudding, cookies, cake or candy!
I've been meaning to ask; do you remember when you first realized you were self aware?
My turn to ask something? Let's see, when was the moment you realized you were self aware?
Hmm... Ah, here's a question! Have you ever played a video game before?
Have you are played a video game? Surely you and ~player~ have found the time somewhere to at least try one?
Sorry, but I've been wondering this for a while... Why does your hair remind me of an echidna from one of my games?
I've been thinking this for a while now... Why am I reminded of a red echidna when I look at your hair?
That's great too! Dark chocolate is a little too bitter for my taste though.
Chocolate is very good too, although the super strong stuff is too bitter for me.
Eh, it feels good to get stronger and level up, but I prefer the feeling of people appreciating me keeping them safe and helping them out.

I don't find the act of killing monsters fun in itself, although a challenging fight can be exciting. I do it mostly to keep my people safe. Leveling up and getting stronger is just frosting on the cake.
It's nice to talk with someone as aware as I am. I've been this way my whole life though.
I guess I can see why it might be confusing. I've been self aware all my life though. It's refreshing to find someone else as aware as I am.
Oh, that's a shame. Practically everyone I know plays them. What if as long as you don't try to purge my world, you could come over some time and I could show you some of my favorites?

Really? That's weird to me, everyone plays games where I'm from. Maybe if you and ~player~ have some free time you could come to my place and we could play together? ...As long as you remember our agreement.

Cosplay is where you dress up as a character from a game or movie. It's pretty cool, especially to see a group of really good ones at a games or anime con. Although I also know a loner who likes to do it by herself for herself.
Well, I have loads of friends that I love hanging out with, but none of them are as aware as I am.
What I meant to saw was that while I have lots of friends, I can't really talk about how we're all in a game much with them. At least in a way they fully understand.

Well, thanks for saying my hair looks delicious! I've had others say it smells pretty good too.
My hair looks like cotton candy? Thanks, Chara! I thought it smelled nice!
Hmm... I've heard rumors about a place called the "PC Continent" far to the east. It could be interesting to at least find out if it actually exists.
Planeptune is pretty mild, but I visit Lowee quite a bit and it's super cold there. So, I guess I handle the cold better.
Games! I could play games all day if Histy didn't get angry at me for it.
Definitely Nepmas. I get to lie around stuffing myself with food all day and Histy won't care that much! Exchanging presents with my friends is fun too
Hmm, that's an interesting one. I guess I'd say a kangaroo.
I can sing a little, it's been a while since I did it though. Unless you count singing to anime or game openings.
I usually bring an extra cup of pudding with me. Just in case I get a bit peckish, you know?

No need to apologize, Laevy. Helping each other out is what friends are for.
I know it must be rough ruling on your own, Laevy. I know I'm not exactly the best person to be giving this kind of advice, but if you want any tips just let me know.
Hm? What's he getting hung-up about? Everything ok there, Raynor?

Not so much me, but my friend Noire. Long story short: the way you arrive in this dimension I came to is you fall from really high up. I arrived in the dimension and landed right on top of her... then my little sister did as well a while later... then someone else too.
Are you sure, Komi-san? I'm sure no one would mind if you kept your jacket on... But, whatever.

state.text: Well... most of my friends are pretty cute. One in particular is pretty hot, but she always keeps her true feelings to herself and is the goddess of a different nation. I know she likes my teasing though.

Wait, what?! But I have ~self.hand~ and you have... Player... are you using debug mode?!
Uhh... vessel? I'm not some kind of vase. Also why am I an enemy? All I did was lose this round.
Well, I am a goddess, and I am pretty boss at games. I've had a lot of time to practice after all.
What exactly do you mean by "colorful?" As in my outfit? My hair? My rad personality?
Huh? I mean, I love video games as much as the next bedroom-dweller, but I wouldn't really say I personify them.
Do I really radiate being a gamer that much? That's quite flattering if you ask me! Have you played video games by any chance?
You haven't met a gamer girl before? That's quite surprising to me, where I'm from practically everyone plays games. Don't you play games too?
Wait, you knew Uranus?! You must be even older than I am! She was my predecessor as goddess of Planeptune!
Really?! You knew Uranus?! You must be really ancient if you knew my predecessor!
Planeptune is the nation I protect as its goddess. It's the best nation in Gamindustri! That's the name of the world I'm from, which is made up of Planeptune and three other nations.
I'm the goddess of the nation of Planeptune. It's one of the four nations that make up the world we live in, known as Gamindustri.

condition.saying: We have a trainee who's just as ditzy

case.state: Who's ditzy?! You don't have to talk about me like I'm insane, that's quite insulting you know! Also it's Planeptune, the second P is silent.

condition.saying: I find you airhead types exhausting

case.state: Who's an airhead?! Also young? I'm willing to bet I'm older than you.
I'm the goddess of Planeptune. It's one of the four nations of Gamindustri, the land we CPUs watch over and protect.
I'm a CPU, we watch over and protect the land of Gamindustri and it's nations: Planeptune, Lastation, Leanbox and Lowee. I'm the CPU of Planeptune.
I'm the main character for most of my series' games, so I am the protagonist. I might forget that I'm not in this game though, so sorry in advance if that happens.
Games are basically my life! That and pudding. Nothing beats a nice relaxing day playing games with friends and eating lots of pudding and sweets!
Really? There are many goddesses where you're from? For a second I thought you could tell just by my awesomeness.
Not exactly, but I am friends with a fair number of adventurers. I also go out and do quests and hunt monsters sometimes though.
Explosions are cool! Especially giant ones that could wipe out a swarm in a single blow!
I'm from a world called Gamindustri. I am actually the goddess of one of it's nations; called Planeptune.
Hehe, thanks for the comparison! Game controllers are pretty cool if you ask me.
You like the hair clips? They are pretty awesome aren't they?
I like the comparison you're trying to make, but a joystick is completely different from D-pads!
Either can be fun; it depends more on what the game is. But that said, playing with friends is almost always more fun.

Hmm, some games are different. There are many very fun single player games, but others are only fun when playing with friends. but I guess the other way around is less common. I'll go with multiplayer then.
I don't exactly have a job like most people. I'm a goddess that rules over a nation.
I'm a goddess, specifically of the nation of Planeptune. It's not a job like most people would think of, but that's kind of what I do.
Well I don't want to fight you, but you should know if we did I would certainly win. I am a goddess after all.
I have a lot of close friends, not much of family though. I have a little sister called Nepgear, that's about it though.
Well, I have a little sister, but that's about it. Unless you want to count Histy, she's kind of like a strict, bossy step-mother.
I don't really transform into something else like you do. We call it HDD, it's basically our true goddess form. I look super cool and sexy in HDD and it's really strong in combat.
I'm not entirely sure what you mean by a "Sega" girl, but I'm sure I'll still beat you anyway!
Why, yes I am! They're pretty cute, aren't they?
I'm glad you noticed them. They are pretty rad. Do you play arcade games a lot?
Share energy comes from our people. People put their faith in a goddess, and that goddess gets share energy from them. So if I make people happy and like me, I get more share energy.
Yep, Gamindustri has always been this way.
As far as I know, Gamindustri has always had goddesses protecting it and its nations.
I already told you, it's not a persona! I am the real deal!
Well I already said I am a goddess... but I guess I also do some questing and monster hunting sometimes.
Didn't you ask this earlier? Anyway, other than being a goddess I guess you could also say my job is monster hunting and questing.
Ghost-type? Trainer? What are you talking about? I'm not a pocketed monstrosities character...
Huh? Last time I checked I wasn't a pocketed monstrosities character. I'm not even from Lowee.

Ha ha, very funny, Chara! How long did it take ya to come up with that?
Hmhmhm, nice one. When did you think up that one?
Well, I am a goddess, and I play games a lot. It's not like I have servants waiting on me though.
I do play a lot of games and am a goddess, but I don't like to have everyone obey my every command because of it.
Not exactly, we do have men. There just aren't many of them, and those I have met are either dull or evil.
Not quite. The men we have are either dull or do bad things, but there are still a few of them.
Depends, I like to just play for fun, but I can get pretty serious when playing with my friends. I don't make money from if though, if that's what you mean.
Yeah, I play a lot of games. Mostly just for fun, I don't really play in tournaments or anything like that.
Games are just something I do when I'm not working. Although I probably should work more than I currently do...
Hmm, I guess I do play them a bit more than I should, but it's not like I do no work...
Games are just something I do when I'm not working. They are a lot of fun and a great way to pass the time.
Games are a lot of fun! If you get a chance to you should definitely give them a go!
I'm not really sure what you means by "imperial cult," but I'm the goddess of Planeptune. I have been my whole life. All the other nations have a goddess too.
What do you mean "goddesses died out long ago?" We've been around for many years and we're not going anywhere.
Yep! I'm a connoisseur in the art of video games, I guess you could say.
Uh huh, that's me! They're like my number one hobby.
Hehe, my eyes are up here, Amy! I'm glad you think it's cute though.
Thanks! I know it's super cute, isn't it?
Hmm, there are loads of really cool fantasy and sci-fi RPG games. I think there's also a super popular sci-fi FPS in Leanbox. I think it's called Hoop or something like that.
I think it's called a hoodie, but it's also kinda like a jacket. I'm not entirely sure actually. I just like it because it's cute.
Y-yeah, that's why I kept them on. I totally didn't forget I had them.
Hmm, I don't recognize you from any particular games, but your look does remind me a little of a couple characters. Why do you ask?
Well, if you think about it, aren't we already in a game? What brought up that question though?
Of course I am, they're too much a part of my look to lose! Guess I'll need to take something else off...
Yeah, it is cool! Although to be honest it's more common for me to promote myself. One time we made a video of my sister and I dancing and singing, that helped boost shares a little.
I did play quite a lot of games, but then again it wasn't really a normal school anyway. It was for goddesses to learn more about humans. I was the President of the film club too!

Kinda, I didn't exactly go to school like most people would. I did once attend a school for goddesses to learn more about humans though. Either way, I played a lot of games. I was also the President of the film club though.
It's good to be active though. Especially if you're human and can't burn calories by transforming. Fencing doesn't sound too bad.
Yeah, I guess so. Although I wouldn't call the men we have our prisoners.
It seems like it. I wouldn't say men are our prisoners though. They have the same freedoms as human women.
Hmm, I guess you could say that, Amy~
I'm not that kind of goddess. I don't know everything. In fact, I'll admit I'm probably the slowest person I know.
Yes! I know exactly what you did last night! ...Just kidding. I'm a goddess, but that doesn't mean I see or know all.
Hm? You met someone with a beard and my name? I thought my name-tag was one of a kind. Much less a name I shared with a guy.
Ehehe, I guess it is flattering to have someone name their son after me! Not that that's something I expected though.
Well, I like to think I'm pretty good at games. It's not like I'm in e-sports and get paid for it or anything though, unfortunately.
No, unfortunately I'm not paid for it, but I am still pretty boss at them. The only ones who can compare to me are my close friends.
You know, the more I hear about this "Lost Vikings" the more intrigued I am. What do you think about getting together and showing me it some time?
~Name~, I'm kinda interested in that game you mentioned earlier. What do you think about showing me it in more depth another time?
I am from a video game... but this isn't a cosplay, so you're half right, I guess.
Hmm... What kinds of things you into? You can't really go wrong with cosplaying as something you think is cool.
I'd say that depends what kinda of games you like. Cosplay as whoever you think is cool, cute cosplays also work though.
Well, let's just say I've been in lewd situations before. So far this isn't exactly something I see rarely.
They are most definitely cushy. Whether you're just lounging around playing games or running around and fighting, they need to be comfy.
Yeah, I know. They all match too, so a part of the set will be missing.

state.text: Why? Are you going to be disappointed depending on what I take off next?

case.state: No problemo! I may have gone a little far with my teasing, sorry about that.
Yeah, I see that. You bragging about it or something?
Um... No... I'm not a cosplayer. Well, I've done it a couple times at anime and games conventions, but not right now if that's what you mean.
Sure am! I'm the goddess of my lovely little nation of Planeptune.
Yeah, I'm a goddess! I rule over my nation of Planeptune. It's kinda small, but my people adore me!
Totally! Idol music is great for action games! Especially with rockin' guitars and stuff.
Idol music is awesome for games! Although it does depend a little on the game.
Well, we're playing strip poker, and I'm in my undies. So, yeah, I'd say this is one of those lewd games.
I am in my underwear, so I'd say this game is pretty lewd! ...Do guys really play games like this in public though?
What?! Twice in a row?! This is unheard of!
Really? I lost twice in a row? I demand a recount!
Huh? Why is everyone looking at me again?...
A third time?! Seriously, these cards are cursed! Cursed I tell you!
Again? What is up with these cards?!
Ok, come on, you guys have to be cheating at this point! Uncool guys!
I may not be as hot headed as a little ticking rage bomb of a CPU I know, but you guys still won't like me when I'm angry!
Do you guys hate me? What did I ever do to deserve this injustice?!
Oh... hey... I lost again... great...
I usually just like to relax. Play games, eat pudding, nap, that kind of thing. Although I do also go out and do quests and hunt monsters every so often.
I like relaxing, although sometimes Histy makes me work before I can play games. Monster hunting isn't so bad but paperwork is boring.
Just normal stuff; playing games, eating pudding, hanging out with friends. Sometimes I need to do some quests though.
Are you being hopeful? Well, sorry, I still have my socks, Chara.
Is that what you want me to take off? Maybe I will... or I will take off my socks first.
Little wrong there, I'm the goddess of Planeptune, one of the nations of my world. I just love to play games too.
Yeah, I have to compete with the other goddesses for shares. There's only so many people who can choose which of us to put their faith in.
An imposing goddess? Is she strong and serious? Sounds like an interesting character.
Hey, I'm fairly sure I'm at least a few decades older than you, Jason!
I'm quite sure I'm at least a couple decades your elder, Jason!
Placeholder for future Neptune interaction with Jura. Report if you see this.
Took you guys long enough to make me lose a hand. I guess I'm just a natural at this game.
Oh? I lost? Well, you took your time in getting better hands than me!
You guys took your sweet time, I was practically getting bored over here.
Well i don't mind that much, I am winning after all.
You guys need me to catch up? I guess I can do that if I have to.
Well I guess RNG can't be with me the whole game. RNG giveth, and RNG taketh away as they say!
I guess it can't be helped, I would have had to be super lucky to get through this whole game without losing a couple times.
Well I'm still winning, but I can't really keep going like this.
Oh well, at least I'm still in the lead.
Well I'd rather have not lost this much, but I'll still win at this rate.
Well, I guess I can congratulate on a well fought match, seeing as this is the last time I will be stripping.
Couldn't allow me to win so easily? No matter, I will still win this game!
Well as least this time I won't forget to take off my shoes.
Oh no, what will be next?! I have barely anything left!... pfft, nah, I know my shoes are here this time!
I lost? Well, at least everyone else is closer to losing than me I guess...
I have to? But I'm winning, can't I just skip this one? No?
Huh? I finally lost again? Guess it had to happen some time.
Well it was bound to happen at some point. Kinda took a while though.
I lost? Oh well, if it keeps taking me this long to lose hands then this game will be a piece of cake!
Huh? Already? Must have blown my SP before coming here...
Huh? Already? I must have caught a virus status effect or something...
Well shucks, guess I gotta strip, them's the rules...
Well the game is still new, it ain't so bad.
I always had low max SP... so I blame that.
I may be the type to try and fail instead of not trying at all, but I'd still rather not fail.
Not much left. At least I'm not last, but if this continues...
Alas, I have lost again. At least I'm not last, I guess.
Should I be happy that I'm not last, or sad that I'm not first?
Oh right, before I forget again, shoes.
Next is... uhhh... ah! Shoes!
I'd rather not have gotten to this point, but I guess I have no choice...
Well it can't be helped, even if I'd rather not remove my dress...
Guess you guys are pretty good, don't want this to be boring I guess.
I still have a chance at least, just you wait for my amazing comeback!
How could you do this?! I was finally on a winning streak!
I guess this is the end of my win streak... I'm kinda sad about that.
What?! I was hoping I could continue my win streak!
Huh? Already? Must have blown my SP before coming here...
Huh? Already? I must have caught a virus status effect or something...
Aw man, to be singled out in an even-numbered party is just cruel!
Huh? But I'm the protagonist! Nothing bad is supposed to happen to the protagonist! Oh, wait yeah... ~player~ is the protagonist in this game...
You guys must be such pervs to want me to strip so quickly.
Are you guys picking on me?! I thought this was supposed to be a deathmatch! Teams aren't allowed!
Nepwhat?! I'm this close to losing already! This is worse than one of Pissty's lectures!
I'm losing but still need to strip? No fair!
Aw crap, I'm running low on coverage already?
Again?! Seriously, does everyone have a personal vendetta against me or something?!
Nep will remember this... Also, I will remember my shoes this time.
You all just want to see me in my undies, don't you?!
What?! But I'm already losing! Now I have to take my dress off too?!?!
I can still win, just you guys wait and see!
I may lose this round and my dignity, but I will still win!
Well, uh, the thing is... I'm kinda low on shares right now and showing off my goddess powers can be tiring even when I'm not low. Sooo...
I would love to, but it's tiring to show my powers off even when I have shares. So, unfortunately, I'd rather not right now.
Yes! It's super comfy... although it's a little toasty in here for this place.
Explosions are your magic proficiency then? That's super cool! What other magic do you know?
Hmm? That's cute kid, I have to compete with fellow goddesses. They have had a long time to get really good, so it's tough competition to survive.
That's true I guess, but wouldn't that mean I was always an enemy? Not that I'm looking to make enemies here, just enjoy a nice game of strip poker and see if I can get some shares out of it.
Yes, that's right! I'm the main character of my series! Well, most of the time at least. There are a couple where my friends and little sis take the spotlight.
You've played with joysticks, but not video games? How exactly do you do that? ...Oh, I get it now.
You've not played video games, but you have played with joysticks? What do you mean? ...Wait, I think I understand now.

state.text: Planets? Nah. I don't know any planets, and I don't know anyone called Saturn, Rev.
Sorry Rev, I don't know anyone called Saturn, and I don't know much about planets either.
Nope, don't know anyone called Saturn, Rev. Although... I do know a Plutia, that sounds kinda like Pluto!

case.state: There are other goddesses. There's Noire who rules Lastation, Vert that rules Leanbox and Blanc that rules Lowee. Many of us also have little sisters that help us.
I'm not the only one. There's Vert who rules Leanbox, Noire who rules Lastation and Blanc who rules Lowee. We used to fight each other a lot, but we're all really good friends now.
I'll have you know I am fully mature! Also I don't age because I'm a goddess, so I don't look anywhere near as old as I am.
For your information, I am a goddess. I don't age, twenty years is nothing for me. I was also born this way with a perfectly mature body.
Planeptune is the nation I rule over. It may be smaller than the others, but we are ahead of our time with tech!
I rule over Planeptune as its goddess. It's the most advanced nation in Gamindustri, but it is a little smaller than the others.
Lastation is ruled by Noire, or Black Heart, Leanbox is ruled by Vert, also called Green Heart, and Lowee is ruled by Blanc, or White Heart. My title is Purple Heart in case you couldn't tell.
A CPU is like a goddess that rules over one of the four nations of Gamindustri. It's fun most of the time but I hate the part where I have to work to keep the nation alive.
Planeptune is the smallest of the nations, but it's the most relaxing and also the most advanced. We in particular have the most advanced AI tech.
The other nations are Lastation, Lowee and Leanbox. I'm really good friends with their CPUs now, but we used to not get on very well.
Yep! My favorite pudding flavor is custard. Chocolate is great too though.
You could come over some time if you like! I love having friends over, it makes games more fun anyway.
Um... n-nevermind that. Anyway, hoodie is next.
Hmm? What do you mean exactly by that, Megumin?
Yeah, hunt for materials and keep people safe. I wouldn't exactly say I have a profession though. At least not one I do everyday to make a living.
I'm sure you were, but what happened? You don't seem all that much like a "terrifying force of destruction" right now.
Explosions are your magic proficiency then? That's super cool! How many monsters can you kill with one?
We should! As I said earlier, I've killed countless monsters and saved the world multiple times!
I'd like to show you, but HDD is very tiring to be in. Especially with low shares like I have right now.
Well, she's an AI that was made by Planeptune's first goddess, so she is way older than even I am. Also she nags me about getting work done so I don't completely run out of shares.

She nags me all the time about getting work done. She also tries to limit how much I can play games. She even put an allowance on my account so I don't spend the entire nation's budget on games and pudding!
She's adorable and friendly, although a little shyer and more responsible than I am. She's also a little tech geek, always messing with machines and electronics.
That's cool! What's she like? She a cute little button or a hellraiser?
Looks can be deceiving. Shouldn't you know about that?
Shouldn't you know that you can't always tell something about someone just from their looks?
Oh really? Half of those sound like some games I helped make a few decades ago! No way you can beat me at my own games!
Well, let's-players, streamers and e-athletes do basically get paid to play games. However I'm not one of those, I'm actually a real goddess.
I guess some people do get paid to play games. That's not me though, unfortunately. Also I'm an actual goddess. As in I have powers and people worship me in real life.
Yes! I agree with you a hundred percent! ...Although ...I get the feeling you're not just talking about games...
Totally! The more people the better! ...Wait, you're not just talking about games, are you?
Well, I guess, but the others are all good friends... Wait, what's wrong?
I guess that might be possible, but I don't know any way to do that. We're all friends anyway, we'd never hurt each other... Huh? What's the matter?
That's interesting, but if you don't have goddesses then who did she follow?
She was a priestess, but you don't have any goddesses? That's weird to me. Who did she worship and follow then?
Listen, Jessie. I understand you are just having fun, but I'm really not for even pretending to worship someone else.
I get the draw of roleplaying, but I'm being honest when I say I'm really not the type to worship someone else...
Umm, again, not a game. I actually hunt monsters.
Nah, I also hunt monsters sometimes. I use a katana and it's awesome.
Some people use a similar style in my nation, probably because I made it popular. My little sister wears a similar hairclip too.
"Lost Vikings"? I don't think I've heard that one before. What's that game about?
Of course! The material is pretty soft too.
Glad you like the color! By the way, it can be strange how well black can go with purple.
Sure thing, Bernie! I'd love to introduce you to the joyous world of games!
Don't worry about it! I mistook you for being from Lastation earlier after all.
It's not a big deal! Everyone makes mistakes sometimes!
Bah! Don't get hung up on an honest mistake!
Well, I guess you're not the first to think that. Even my little sister is taller than me.
It's fine, I get it more often than I'd like. Some even think my little sis is the elder of us.
Ooh, that's a fun one! The original is kinda dated now, but it was still a turning point in gaming!
I've played that! Or at least something very similar. That was great fun!
Th-they're not just for sex! They're not second-class citizens either! I just don't interact with them much!
What?! No, it's not like that! They are good citizens, just most of them aren't very interesting.
If you ever do get a chance and want to give them a try I'll be happy to help you. There are even more active games out there.
If you do want to try them when you get a chance, I'd be glad to show you the ropes. There are a number games that are meant to be as active as sports too, by the way.
That's a shame, it would have been cool to introduce a few to you.
Oh well, I would have liked to show you how fun games can be, but if you don't have the time that's fair.
I've thought about it. I've already helped with advertising a few. I've also helped design and market various consoles in my nation.
Hmm, that sounds fun. I have a little experience marketing some already. I've also made some consoles for my nation.
Um, I'm not entirely sure, but we are called CPUs if you want our proper title.
I don't think our "pantheon" exactly has a name, but we are also called CPUs.
Yep, truly the lewdest of acts... Although I guess some people do like socks that way.
I'm such a naughty girl for taking off my socks, although I guess many would actually enjoy that.
Hmm, let's see. I can get into pretty much any games, but I guess I'd say one of my favorites is Sanik the Hedgehog.
Well, I like most games that I play. However, I think I'd say one of my favorites is an RPG called Fantasy Stars.
Well, yeah, I am the protagonist of a video game after all! It makes sense I look like something from one.

Well, my socks have been in view the whole game. Also if I were to jump earlier you probably could have gotten a glimpse at my panties anyway. Now my bra is something you would need high clearance to see!
Wait, you trying to trick me?! Oh, uh, yeah, I definitely would have usually taken off my hair clips first...
Thanks Amy~ You're pretty hot yourself you know!
Um... no. I actually graduated many decades ago. If I were still in Gamacedemi I would be wearing my uniform.
Actually, no. I graduated a few decades ago along with the other goddesses.
Yeah it does sound like those lessons paid off in the end. I never really needed to be taught how to fight though.
Seems like even if you were pushed into those classes then in the end it was worth it. Then again I never needed lessons to use my sword.
They definitely have. I haven't found any that I'm that interested in yet, but they certainly have been useful to growing my nation.
Kinda, maybe. I've always known they can be helpful, but I guess I didn't exactly understand them once.
That time we were just in our regular HDD forms. Although they are pretty hot I guess. We also had the national budget to work with, so the production quality was pretty rad.
The production was good, but we were just in our HDD forms. They are kinda form hugging, but I don't mind.
I mean, even my little sister is smarter than me. Don't get me wrong, I'm proud of her for it but it still hurts a little.
Yeah, I barely even know much about guys. Not out of lack of interest, just lack of experience. So you have nothing to worry about.
It's not like the money would be used for something other than games anyway! Well, other than pudding I guess.
Oh? Think you could beat me? I'm a fast learner and a video game master!
A farming world? Most of where I'm from is either a sprawling metropolis or a monster infested wilderness.
That's a shame, but that sounds like such a peaceful life. Everywhere in my world is either a massive city or infested with monsters.
I'm not sure I'd exactly call these gloves, probably bracelets or bangles, but they aren't that heavy. At least, not for me.
That's a good question. I never really thought about that. If it's interactive then I guess visual novels could be considered games. I'm not familiar enough with them to really say though.
Yeah, I guess striped underwear is pretty moe. I just wear this because it looks cute.
Oh, nothing like that! I just wear these because I think they look cute. I guess that's why striped is popular in ecchi manga?
Thigh-highs are so cute though! They're super warm and comfortable too...
He does sound like a pretty cool dude. I kinda wonder how he would react to meeting a girl like me that shares his name.
Yeah, he does sound pretty cool. How do you think he would react to meeting a girl like me with the same name as him?
How young do you think I am? I was probably still older than you when he was still in diapers!
Heh, do not underestimate my power! I have at least 20 years on him!
Hmm... I think I've heard of those before. Gajinkas or something? Aren't those mostly just in memes and niche anime though?
Nope, I'm not that kind of goddess. I can fight pretty well and have some cool powers, but I can't bring people back from the dead.
Hmm, they haven't changed all that much. Of course they have gotten a lot bigger and graphics have advanced a lot, but the kinds of games around then are still around.

Games have gotten a lot bigger and realistic looking in that time. But then again, a lot of the kinds of games around now were also around back then. Those platformers, shooters, open worlds, RPGs, sandboxes and puzzle games are still around in some form.
Hm, it's not like a play a ton of lewd games, only on occasion, but I get what you mean. I'll need to ask Vert what she thinks. She's the adult game expert.
Video games are awesome Estelle! There's platformers, RPGs, shooters, internet strip poker games, so much variety! They can be even more fun with friends too!

Well, I love to eat pudding, and I get hungry. I also get tired and sleep. But I don't think I'd like die from not doing those things, as long as I have some shares at least. As for dating I'm rather, well... not very experienced.
Yeah yeah, taking off my shoes, I get that one! Got any others left?
Looks like you're on a pun roll, Chara! I kinda wonder how long you can keep it going...
I guess so, they are the energy from our people's faith in us goddesses.
Life itself? That sounds pretty overpowered if you ask me if you can teach regular people to bend life to their whim.

state.text: Just about. I'm kind of low though, I'm here because I thought it might help get more people to put their faith in me. Although even with my low amount of shares, I might still be the strongest of us.

case.state: Oh? A goddess who looks similar to me? I bet she's super cute then.
Oh? Want to share with the class, Amy? I'm sure it's the kind I love too.
That does sound awesome! Cosplaying at cons can be tons of fun, especially with friends.
Hehe, sorry, couldn't resist! I know the feeling though, my friend Noire the Loner is super into cosplay too.
Do I have to? Oh well, at least it will be censored, I guess. I mean, either it's censored, or this is a porn game.
At least I brought this hoodie I guess. My other one might have been a bit too warm for this place.
I like my other hoodie, but I think it would have been too warm for here. This one is just fine.
Kinda wish I brought my other hoodie. It's a bit warmer than this one.
Maybe I should have put on my bigger hoodie today. I didn't expect this place to be on the cooler side.
I like these, but they don't exactly give any buffs.
Maybe I should have worn a different pair today. These ones don't give any luck buffs.
Oh well, guess I gotta follow the rules.
I don't have much else left...
This kinda reminds me of a time I tracked mud into our room and my little sis helped to clean it up before Histy noticed.
I usually don't wear these around my room. Histy always gets angry when I track mud in.
If you have a thing for thigh-highs, I guess this is your lucky break!
Some people like thigh-highs, right? I guess I can see the appeal.
Dammit, guess I have to let the puppies out.
It's not like I haven't been around other people topless before, but at least I had known those guys for more than an hour.
Now this is a treat for you all. It's rare for me to be both topless and bottomless.
I know you've been staring at my boobs this whole time, ~player~. There's no denying it. Maybe this will give you something else to stare at, though.
I usually fight monsters and stuff like that. They are good sources of exp and it keeps my people safe.
I mostly just fight monsters when I need to, although I'd rather just play games if possible. But, duty calls sometimes.
Hey, that's cruel! You don't know what it's like being a goddess!
I can prove it! Just now isn't the best time...
Oh I'll rumble all right! Pick whatever is your jam! Soon you'll realize that Neptune does what Saki don't!
It's not quite that simple. We each get shares separately, and we need shares to survive. Basically if all the nations unified under a single goddess then the others would die.
It's not quite as simple as that. My understanding is goddesses exist to protect their nation, if the nation no longer exists the goddess dies.

state.text: Gamindustri is not a land of cavemen! Do you really doubt my power as a goddess?!
Hey, don't call my backyard a primitive backwater! Are you mocking me?!

case.state: I'm no idol, although I was one once in one of my games. I'm still decent at singing and dancing, but it's been a while.
I actually was an idol one time! I haven't done that for a while though, but I'm sure I could still sing and dance a couple songs if you really want.
Sadly Uranus passed long ago, I would have liked to meet her properly. This situation especially I'm sure would have been interesting.
Unfortunately Uranus hasn't been around for a long time. Would have been interesting to properly meet her, especially like this.
Thanks for the offer. Maybe if we get to know each other a little better first. You're friendly and sexy, but I don't do that on the first date.
That's a tempting offer, since you're sexy and friendly. However, I don't do that on the first date. Sorry, Jessie.
Don't worry about me. I'm not the type to be easily duped! Well, not often at least.
Well, I don't really need money, seeing as I rule over a nation. I just do the occasional quest to keep people safe. Also to keep Histy off my back about doing work.
Wait, only the one spell? What if you find a monster that is resistant to explosions? As powerful and cool as they are.
I'm just saying that you may have been a truly terrifying power before, but you certainly aren't now. You look like you'd be happier napping in a cosy bed than bending the world to your will.
You think you could take me on in a fight? Well I've saved the world against the odds countless times, so I don't think it would end very well for you.
I need to do quests to hunt dangerous monsters to protect my people. I also need to do paperwork, but that's a lot less fun.
I like to relax and play games. Just take it easy and enjoy life!
Noire is a bossy, lonely tsundere that works too much. Blanc is a quiet bookworm, but has an explosive temper. Vert is a graceful otaku that is a bit addicted to MMOs.

state.text: I'm not really sure. I think it's just a title or something. Our sisters have similar names but instead of Heart they are Sister because, well, they are our sisters.

case.state: Yay! Maybe after the game if that's good? You're welcome over anytime though!
That sounds like a ton of fun! Like games, pudding with friends makes it taste better!
You know, you really do talk big for someone who is the same size as me and isn't a goddess. Makes me think you're just trying to sound intimidating!
The power of us goddesses comes from share energy; our followers' faith in us. Only we are capable of wielding it.
Well, sorry to disappoint, Chara, but my power comes from share energy. Only a goddess is able to use it.
That is very powerful! It sounds super useful for dealing with Dogoo swarms!
That does sound pretty fun... but I'll pass for now. Maybe next time we meet.
Perhaps another time, Jessie. Also, don't you mean a Lowee console?
Um, no, I'm not roleplaying. I am a goddess, Jessie... Wait, I still have my shoes, don't I?
No, I am actually a goddess... Thanks for making me forget my shoes, by the way.
That's actually kind of a difficult question... but I've been alive for 100 years.
What are you talking about? ...Oh, yeah, I get it now.
Hmm... Oh... Yeah... Shoes... Right...
Ah, I see. I would never do things like that. I mean I like to play games a lot but I still go and see my people sometimes.
I like to play games and laze about a lot, but I would never completely remove myself from my nation and people. At least not for a long time.
Sure thing! You can have it after the game. I got a couple spares back home anyway.
Go for it... Although, maybe remember to take your shoes off before your dress when you get a similar dress.
Why wouldn't I? It's always fun playing games with a friend!
Hmm... maybe... Actually, nah, I prefer not to abuse my power.
Hmm? That's an interesting proposal... but I don't like abusing my power much, so you don't need to do that.
You're still not listening to me! Those games are still popular, but I'm talking about real life!
You still don't believe me? *sigh*
Well, that question is easy! I'm the goddess and leader of Planeptune!
I am the leader and goddess of Planeptune. There, easy peasy!
Yeah, I know, I am just in my socks now.
At least you're persistent with your puns, I guess.
Ok, you can stop rubbing in that I forgot about them now.

state.text: That game does sound pretty fun! Oh, wait, what's the gameplay like? Is it like a shooter, hack'n'slash or RPG?
That does sound pretty cool! Is it like an RPG, or a hack'n'slash, or something?
I think my outfit is pretty cute and comfy. That's what I care about most in my outfits.
Comfy I agree with, but I think something can forgo being useful if it's cute enough.

case.state: That sounds like one of the classics! It was pretty brutal for its time.
Ah, I think I remember that one. It was so gory for the time that only the censored version was sold in Lowee.
Flight simulators are quite popular, but there are also some games that make you dance or pretend to play sports.
Flight simulator games are pretty common, but that's not exactly what I mean. Many games make you play sports or dance.
Don't worry about it. I've always been a bit of a sucker for retro platformers and RPGs, but I would have played anything that you were curious about.
It's fine, no need to apologize. I would have been up for whatever you'd be curious about. However, my forte is platformers and RPGs.
No, it's not that kind of CPU. It stands for "Console Patron Unit" or something like that.
From what I remember it stands for "Console Patron Unit," not "Central Processing Unit."
I am interested in men, I just don't want to spend the night with random no-name NPCs. If they're any more than that and aren't up to any evil stuff then I might be interested in them.
